hero.lead: Self-organized gravel/MTB event. No commerce, no cops—just trails, sweat and good people. Queer · left · punk · renegade.

about.title: all cyclists are beautiful
about.body: HEART TIMES is a DIY ride, not a race. We share GPX routes, refill spots and a meetup point. You are responsible for your safety, your bike and your crew. Respect the forest, fields and people. No drop, no Nazis, no sexism.
about.body1:
Heppy hello at Heart Times! Your self-supported bikepacking adventure from the community for the community- no profit, no Schnickschnack. Grab your favourite bike and get outa there - head off, body on! Butter your sandwiches and lube the chain, put your favourite cassette in the Walkman and some brisk knickers in your bag! Don't forget your toothbrush! 

The route will take you over gravel, tarmac and wild forest paths, across national borders and your own, from Dresden to Dresden, always following your heart. 

A varied 628 kilometres with 6700 metres of elevation are waiting for you. You will pass 7 checkpoints and each one is worth a stop! 

Arrive back with us within 75 hours. You and 99 other Pedalpeepz will set off together. 50 places are reserved for FLINTA*. 

Bring your boots! (min. 40mm tyre width recommended) 

Do you feel that tingling in your legs? Get ready!

It will be exhausting - but we can do it!
points: Black & pink dress code: encouraged, not required.
